description.description: Brief overview or details describing the content or purpose of the solution folder.

id.description: Unique identifier for the solution folder.

name.description: Name or title of the solution folder for easy identification.

visibility.description: Indicates the visibility settings of the solution folder, e.g., public, private, restricted.

company_ids.description: Array of IDs representing the companies associated with the solution folder.

contact_segment_ids.description: Array of segment IDs indicating the contact segments associated with the solution folder.

company_segment_ids.description: Array of segment IDs specifying the company segments associated with the solution folder.

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the solution folder was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating the last update time of the solution folder.
